summary.span: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way to generate streams or files that contain XML data.

span.span: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way to generate streams or files that contain XML data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类将 XML 数据写入流、文件、文本读取器或字符串。The class writes XML data to a stream, file, text reader, or string. 它支持 W3C[可扩展标记语言（xml）1.0 （第四版）](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)和[XML 1.0 （第三版）建议中的命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)。It supports the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (fourth edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) and [Namespaces in XML 1.0 (third edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) recommendations. 使用 类的成员可以：The members of the class enable you to: - 检查字符是不是合法的 XML 字符，元素和属性的名称是不是有效的 XML 名称。Verify that the characters are legal XML characters and that element and attribute names are valid XML names. - 检查 XML 文档的格式是否正确。Verify that the XML document is well-formed. - 将二进制字节编码为 Base64 或 BinHex，并写出结果文本。Encode binary bytes as Base64 or BinHex, and write out the resulting text. - 使用公共语言运行时类型而不是字符串传递值，以避免必须手动执行值转换。Pass values by using common language runtime types instead of strings, to avoid having to manually perform value conversions. - 将多个文档写入一个输出流。Write multiple documents to one output stream. - 写出有效的名称、限定名和名称标记。Write valid names, qualified names, and name tokens. 本节内容：In this section: [创建 XML 编写器](#create) [Creating an XML writer](#create) [指定输出格式](#output) [Specifying the output format](#output) [数据一致性](#conformance) [Data conformance](#conformance) [编写元素](#writing_elements) [Writing elements](#writing_elements) [编写属性](#writing_attributes) [Writing attributes](#writing_attributes) [处理命名空间](#handling_ns) [Handling namespaces](#handling_ns) [写入类型化数据](#writing_types) [Writing typed data](#writing_types) [关闭 XML 编写器](#close) [Closing the XML writer](#close) [异步编程](#async) [Asynchronous programming](#async) [安全注意事项Security considerations](#security) ## 创建 XML 编写器Creating an XML writer 若要创建 实例，请使用 方法。To create an instance, use the method. 若要指定要在 XML 编写器上启用的功能集，请向 方法传递 。To specify the set of features you want to enable on the XML writer, pass an to the method. 否则，将使用默认设置。Otherwise, default settings are used. 有关详细信息，请参阅 参考页。See the reference pages for details. ## 指定输出格式Specifying the output format 类包含若干属性，这些属性控制 输出的格式：The class includes several properties that control how output is formatted: |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定要使用的文本编码。Specifies the text encoding to use. 默认值为 `Encoding.UTF8`。The default is `Encoding.UTF8`.| ||指示是否使元素缩进。Indicates whether to indent elements. 默认值为 `false` （无缩进）。The default is `false` (no indentation).| ||指定在缩进时要使用的字符串。Specifies the character string to use when indenting. 默认值为两个空格。The default is two spaces.| ||指定分行符要使用的字符串。Specifies the character string to use for line breaks. 默认值为 `\r\n`（回车符、换行符）。The default is `\r\n` (carriage return, line feed).| ||指定如何处理换行符。Specifies how to handle newline characters.| ||指示是否在新行上编写属性。Indicates whether to write attributes on a new line. 使用此属性时，应将 设置为 `true`。 should be set to `true` when using this property. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`.| ||指示是否编写 XML 声明。Indicates whether to write an XML declaration. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`.| 和 属性控制无效空白如何格式化。The and properties control how insignificant white space is formatted. 例如，若要缩进元素节点：For example, to indent element nodes: [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#8)] 使用 用一种额外的缩进级别来编写新行上的每个属性：Use the to write each attribute on a new line with one extra level of indentation: [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#9)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#9)] ## 数据一致性Data conformance XML 编写器使用 类中的两个属性来检查数据一致性：An XML writer uses two properties from the class to check for data conformance: - 属性指示 XML 编写器检查字符，如果任何字符在合法范围之外时引发 异常，如 W3C 所定义。The property instructs the XML writer to check characters and throw an exception if any characters are outside the legal range, as defined by the W3C. - 属性将 XML 编写器配置为检查写入的流是否符合由 W3C 定义的格式正确的 XML 1.0 文档或文档片段的规则。The property configures the XML writer to check that the stream being written complies with the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document or document fragment, as defined by the W3C. 下表介绍了这三个一致性级别。The three conformance levels are described in the following table. 默认值为 。The default is . 有关详细信息，请参阅 属性和 枚举。For details, see the property and the enumeration. |LevelLevel|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||XML 输出符合格式正确的 XML 1.0 文档的规则，并可由任何符合要求的处理器处理。The XML output conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document and can be processed by any conforming processor.| ||XML 输出符合格式正确的 XML 1.0 文档片段的规则。The XML output conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document fragment.| ||XML 编写器根据传入数据确定要应用的聘约确认检查的级别（文档或片段）。The XML writer determines which level of conformation checking to apply (document or fragment) based on the incoming data.| ## 编写元素Writing elements 您可以使用以下 方法来写入元素节点。You can use the following methods to write element nodes. 有关示例，请参阅列出的方法。For examples, see the methods listed. |使用Use|至To| |---------|--------| ||写入整个元素节点，包括字符串值。Write an entire element node, including a string value.| ||通过使用多个方法调用来写入元素值。To write an element value by using multiple method calls. 例如，可以调用 来编写类型化的值，调用 来编写字符实体，调用 来编写属性，也可以编写子元素。For example, you can call to write a typed value, to write a character entity, to write an attribute, or you can write a child element. 这是 方法的更复杂的版本。This is a more sophisticated version of the method.

若要关闭元素，请调用 或 方法。To close the element, you call the or method.| ||复制在 或 对象当前位置找到的元素节点。To copy an element node found at the current position of an or object. 在调用时，会将源对象中的所有内容复制到 实例。When called, it copies everything from the source object to the instance.| ## 编写属性Writing attributes 您可以使用以下 方法来写入元素节点上的属性。You can use the following methods to write attributes on element nodes. 这些方法还可用于在元素上创建命名空间声明，如下一部分中所述。These methods can also be used to create namespace declarations on an element, as discussed in the next section. |使用Use|至To| |---------|--------| ||写入整个属性节点，包括字符串值。To write an entire attribute node, including a string value.| ||使用多个方法调用编写特性值。To write the attribute value using multiple method calls. 例如，可以调用 来编写类型化值。For example, you can call to write a typed value. 这是 方法的更复杂的版本。This is a more sophisticated version of the method.

若要关闭元素，请调用 方法。To close the element, you call the method.| ||复制 对象当前位置找到的所有属性。To copy all the attributes found at the current position of an object. 写入的属性取决于读取器当前所处节点的类型：The attributes that are written depend on the type of node the reader is currently positioned on:

-对于特性节点，它将写入当前特性，然后写入特性的其余部分，直到元素结束标记为止。- For an attribute node, it writes the current attribute, and then the rest of the attributes until the element closing tag.
-对于元素节点，它将写入元素包含的所有属性。- For an element node, it writes all attributes contained by the element.
-对于 XML 声明节点，它将写入声明中的所有属性。- For an XML declaration node, it writes all the attributes in the declaration.
-对于所有其他节点类型，该方法将引发异常。- For all other node types, the method throws an exception.| ## 处理命名空间Handling namespaces 命名空间用于限定 XML 文档中的元素和属性的名称。Namespaces are used to qualify element and attribute names in an XML document. 命名空间前缀将元素和属性与命名空间关联，后者又与 URI 引用关联。Namespace prefixes associate elements and attributes with namespaces, which are in turn associated with URI references. 命名空间在 XML 文档中实现元素和属性名称的唯一性。Namespaces create element and attribute name uniqueness in an XML document. 维护与当前命名空间范围中定义的所有命名空间对应的命名空间堆栈。The maintains a namespace stack that corresponds to all the namespaces defined in the current namespace scope. 在编写元素和属性时，可以通过下列方式利用命名空间：When writing elements and attributes you can utilize namespaces in the following ways: - 使用 方法手动声明命名空间。Declare namespaces manually by using the method. 如果知道如何最大程度地优化命名空间声明的数目，可以使用此方法。This can be useful when you know how to best optimize the number of namespace declarations. 有关示例，请参阅 方法。For an example, see the method. - 用新的命名空间重写当前命名空间声明。Override the current namespace declaration with a new namespace. 在下面的代码中， 方法将 `"x"` 前缀的命名空间 URI 从 `"123"` 更改为 `"abc"`。In the following code, the method changes the namespace URI for the `"x"` prefix from `"123"` to `"abc"`. [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#18)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#18)] 代码生成以下 XML 字符串：The code generates the following XML string: ```xml ``` - 在编写属性或元素时指定命名空间前缀。Specify a namespace prefix when writing attributes or elements. 许多用于写入元素和属性的方法使您能够执行此操作。Many of the methods used to write element and attributes enable you to do this. 例如， 方法写入开始标记并将其与指定的命名空间和前缀关联。For example, the method writes a start tag and associates it with a specified namespace and prefix. ## 写入类型化数据Writing typed data 方法接受公共语言运行时（CLR）对象，根据 XML 架构定义语言（XSD）数据类型转换规则将输入值转换为其字符串表示形式，并通过使用 方法将其写入。The method accepts a common language runtime (CLR) object, converts the input value to its string representation according to XML schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules, and writes it out by using the method. 这比使用 类中的方法在写出类型化数据之前将其转换为字符串值更容易。This is easier than using the methods in the class to convert the typed data to a string value before writing it out. 写入文本时，键入的值将通过使用该架构类型的 规则序列化为文本。When writing to text, the typed value is serialized to text by using the rules for that schema type. 有关对应于 CLR 类型的默认 XSD 数据类型，请参阅 方法。For default XSD data types that correspond to CLR types, see the method. 还可用于写入到 XML 数据存储区。The can also be used to write to an XML data store. 例如， 类可以创建一个 对象，用于为 对象创建节点。For example, the class can create an object to create nodes for an object. 如果数据存储具有可供其使用的架构信息，则如果尝试转换为不允许的类型， 方法将引发异常。如果数据存储没有可用的架构信息， 方法会将所有值视为 `xsd:anySimpleType` 类型。If the data store has schema information available to it, the method throws an exception if you try to convert to a type that is not allowed.If the data store does not have schema information available to it, the method treats all values as an `xsd:anySimpleType` type. ## 关闭 XML 编写器Closing the XML writer 使用 方法输出 XML 时，在调用 方法之前，不会写入元素和特性。When you use methods to output XML, the elements and attributes are not written until you call the method. 例如，如果使用 填充 对象，则在关闭 实例之前，将无法在目标文档中看到已写入的元素和属性。For example, if you are using to populate an object, you won't be able to see the written elements and attributes in the target document until you close the instance. ## 异步编程Asynchronous programming 大多数 方法的方法名称末尾都有 "Async"。Most of the methods have asynchronous counterparts that have "Async" at the end of their method names. 例如， 的异步等效项。For example, the asynchronous equivalent of is . 对于不包含异步对应的 方法，请将返回值转换为字符串并改用 方法。For the method, which doesn't have an asynchronous counterpart, convert the return value to a string and use the method instead. ## 安全注意事项Security considerations 使用 类时，请注意以下事项：Consider the following when working with the class: - 引发的异常可能会泄露您不希望冒泡到应用程序的路径信息。Exceptions thrown by the can disclose path information that you do not want bubbled up to the app. 应用必须捕获异常并对其进行相应处理。Your app must catch exceptions and process them appropriately. - 不会验证传递到 或 方法的任何数据。 does not validate any data that is passed to the or method. 不应将任意数据传递给这些方法。You should not pass arbitrary data to these methods. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用异步 API 来生成 XML。The following example code shows how to use the asynchronous API to generate XML. ```csharp async Task TestWriter(Stream stream) { XmlWriterSettings settings = new XmlWriterSettings(); settings.Async = true; using (XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(stream, settings)) { await writer.WriteStartElementAsync("pf", "root", "http://ns"); await writer.WriteStartElementAsync(null, "sub", null); await writer.WriteAttributeStringAsync(null, "att", null, "val"); await writer.WriteStringAsync("text"); await writer.WriteEndElementAsync(); await writer.WriteProcessingInstructionAsync("pName", "pValue"); await writer.WriteCommentAsync("cValue"); await writer.WriteCDataAsync("cdata value"); await writer.WriteEndElementAsync(); await writer.FlushAsync(); } } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何保持打开状态的元素或属性都将自动关闭。Any elements or attributes left open are automatically closed. > [!NOTE] > 使用 方法输出 XML 时，在调用 方法之前，将不会写入元素和特性。When you use the methods to output XML, the elements and attributes will not be written until you call the method. 例如，如果你使用 XmlWriter 填充 ，则在关闭 之前，你将无法观察目标文档中的已写入元素和属性。For example, if you are using the XmlWriter to populate an , until you close the , you will not be able to observe the written elements and attributes in the target document. ## Examples 下面的示例写入 XML 节点。The following example writes an XML node. [!code-cpp[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/CPP/XmlWriter.Close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/CS/writeelems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/VB/writeelems.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 重载包括接受 对象的 `settings` 参数。Some of the overloads include a `settings` parameter that accepts an object. 您可以使用此对象执行以下操作：You can use this object to: - 指定要在创建的 对象上支持的功能。Specify which features you want supported on the created object. - 重新使用 对象以创建多个编写器对象。Reuse the object to create multiple writer objects. 将为每个创建的写入器复制 对象并标记为只读。The object is copied and marked read-only for each created writer. 更改 实例上的设置不会影响具有相同设置的现有写入器。Changes to the settings on an instance do not affect existing writers with the same settings. 因此，可以使用相同的设置创建多个具有相同功能的写入器。Thus, you can use the same settings to create multiple writers with the same functionality. 也可以修改 实例上的设置并创建具有不同功能集的新写入器。Or, you can modify the settings on an instance and create a new writer with a different set of features. - 向现有的 XML 编写器添加功能。Add features to an existing XML writer. 方法可以接受其他 对象。The method can accept another object. 基础 对象不必是静态 方法创建的 XML 编写器。The underlying object does not have to be an XML writer created by the static method. 例如，你可以指定用户定义的 XML 编写器来向添加附加功能。For example, you can specify a user-defined XML writer to add additional features to. - 充分利用功能，如更好的一致性检查和符合[XML 1.0 建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)，这些建议仅在静态 方法创建 对象上可用。Take full advantage of features such as better conformance checking and compliance to the [XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) that are available only on objects created by the static method. 如果使用不接受 对象的 重载，则使用以下默认写入器设置：If you use a overload that doesn't accept an object, the following default writer settings are used: |设置Setting|默认Default| |-------------|-------------| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||| ||| ||`false`| ||两个空格Two spaces| || （不删除） (no removal)| ||`\r\n`（回车符、换行符）`\r\n` (carriage return, new line)| ||| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| ||`true`| > [!NOTE] > 尽管 .NET Framework 包含 类，该类是 类的具体实现，但建议使用 方法创建 实例。Although the .NET Framework includes the class, which is a concrete implementation of the class, we recommend that you create instances by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载时，使用以下默认设置的 对象用于创建 XML 编写器：When you use this overload, an object with the following default settings is used to create the XML writer: |设置Setting|默认Default| |-------------|-------------| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||| ||| ||`false`| ||两个空格Two spaces| || （不删除） (no removal)| ||`\r\n`（回车符、换行符）`\r\n` (carriage return, new line)| ||| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| ||`true`| 如果要在创建的编写器上指定支持的功能，请使用将 对象作为其参数之一的重载，并使用自定义设置传入 对象。If you want to specify the features to support on the created writer, use an overload that takes an object as one of its arguments, and pass in an object with your custom settings. 此外，XmlWriter 始终将字节顺序标记（BOM）写入基础数据流;但是，某些流不能有 BOM。Also, XmlWriter always writes a Byte Order Mark (BOM) to the underlying data stream; however, some streams must not have a BOM. 若要省略 BOM，请创建新的 对象，并将 "编码" 属性设置为新的 对象，将构造函数中的布尔值设置为 false。To omit the BOM, create a new object and set the Encoding property to be a new object with the Boolean value in the constructor set to false. ## Examples 下面的示例将 XML 片段写入内存流。The following example writes an XML fragment to a memory stream. （它使用 重载，此重载还配置新的 XML 编写器实例上的设置。）(It uses the overload, which also configures the settings on the new XML writer instance.) [!code-csharp[XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput/CS/writestream2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriterSettings.CloseOutput/VB/writestream2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果读取器定位在 `element` 节点上 `WriteAttributes` 复制所有包含的属性。If the reader is positioned on an `element` node `WriteAttributes` copies all the contained attributes. 如果读取器定位在 `attribute` 节点上，此方法将写入当前特性，然后将其余的特性写入到元素结束标记之前。If the reader is positioned on an `attribute` node, this method writes the current attribute, then the rest of the attributes until the element closing tag. 如果读取器定位在 `XmlDeclaration` 节点上，此方法将写入声明中的所有属性。If the reader is positioned on an `XmlDeclaration` node, this method writes all the attributes in the declaration. 如果读取器定位在任何其他节点类型上，此方法将引发 。If the reader is positioned on any other node type this method throws an . 如果使用 调用此方法，则为了确保格式正确的 XML，可能导致无效文档的任何内容（已从实体中扩展）将在写入时被替换。If this method is called using , to ensure well-formed XML any content (which has been expanded from the entities) that could result in an invalid document is replaced when written. 例如，如果某个属性包含一个已扩展的 `>` 实体，则为了确保格式正确的文档，当用 `>`写出时，扩展的 > 会被替换。For example, if an attribute includes an `>` entity that has been expanded, to ensure a well-formed document the expanded > is replaced when written out with `>`. 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下面的示例将所有元素复制到输出，将标记名称更改为大写，并将所有属性复制不变。The following example copies all the elements to the output, changes the tag names to upper case, and copies all the attributes unchanged. [!code-cpp[XmlWriter.WriteAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteAttributes/CPP/writeattrs_v2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlWriter.WriteAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteAttributes/CS/writeattrs_v2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter.WriteAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteAttributes/VB/writeattrs_v2.vb#1)] 该示例使用文件（`test1.xml`）作为输入。The example uses the file, `test1.xml`, as input. remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteAttributeString` 执行以下操作：`WriteAttributeString` does the following: - 如果属性值包含双引号或单引号，则它们分别替换为 `"` 和 `'`。If the attribute value includes double or single quotes, they are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively. - 如果写入 `xml:space` 属性，编写器将验证属性值是否有效。If writing an `xml:space` attribute, the writer verifies the attribute value is valid. （有效值为 `preserve` 或 `default`。）(Valid values are `preserve` or `default`.) - 如果写入 `xml:lang` 特性，编写器不会根据 W3C XML 1.0 建议验证属性值是否有效。If writing an `xml:lang` attribute, the writer does not verify that the attribute value is valid according to the W3C XML 1.0 recommendation. 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 以下示例写出书籍。The following example writes out a book. remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，字节缓冲区可能包含 GIF 图像的二进制内容。For example, the byte buffer may contain the binary contents of a GIF image. 这显然不是有效的 XML。This clearly would not be valid XML. `Base64` 编码旨在以文本形式表示任意字节序列，其中包含65个 us-ascii 字符（[a-za-z0-9 +/=]），其中的每个字符对二进制数据的6位进行编码。The `Base64` encoding is designed to represent arbitrary byte sequences in a text form comprised of the 65 US-ASCII characters ([A-Za-z0-9+/=]) where each character encodes 6 bits of the binary data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[征求意见文档网站](https://www.rfc-editor.org)上的征求意见文档（RFC）1521。For more information, see Requests for Comments (RFC) 1521 located on the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来写入 `Base64` 的数据。The following example uses the method to write `Base64` data. `Base64` 数据嵌入 `` 元素中。The `Base64` data is embedded within an `` element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用 `WriteStartAttribute`，则可以通过此方法关闭属性。If you call `WriteStartAttribute`, you can close the attribute with this method. 还可以通过再次调用 `WriteStartAttribute`、调用 或调用 来关闭属性。You can also close the attribute by calling `WriteStartAttribute` again, calling , or calling . > [!NOTE] > 使用 方法输出 XML 时，在调用 方法之前，将不会写入元素和特性。When you use the methods to output XML, the elements and attributes will not be written until you call the method. 例如，如果你使用 XmlWriter 填充 ，则在关闭 之前，你将无法观察目标文档中的已写入元素和属性。For example, if you are using the XmlWriter to populate an , until you close the , you will not be able to observe the written elements and attributes in the target document. 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示了此方法支持的节点类型。The following table shows the supported node types for this method. |NodeTypeNodeType|WriteNode 行为WriteNode Behavior| |--------------|------------------------| |`None`|写出所有节点，而不考虑类型。Writes out all the nodes irrespective of type. 也就是说，编写器使用 ，并写出所有读取的节点，包括属性、处理指令、注释等。That is, the writer consumes the and writes out all the nodes read including attributes, processing instructions, comments, and so on.

如果 处于初始状态，则会发生这种情况。This situation occurs when the is in an initial state. （ 属性返回 `ReaderState.Initial`）。(The property returns `ReaderState.Initial`).| |`Element`|写出元素节点和任何属性节点。Writes out the element node and any attribute nodes.| |`Attribute`|无操作。No operation. 请改用 或 。Use or instead.| |`Text`|写出文本节点。Writes out the text node.| |`CDATA`|写出 CDATA 节节点。Writes out the CDATA section node.| |`EntityReference`|写出实体引用节点。Writes out the entity reference node.| |`ProcessingInstruction`|写出处理指令节点。Writes out the processing instruction node.| |`Comment`|写出注释节点。Writes out the comment node.| |`DocumentType`|写出文档类型节点。Writes out the document type node.| |`SignificantWhitespace`|写出有效的空白节点。Writes out the significant white space node.| |`Whitespace`|写出空白节点。Writes out the white space node.| |`EndElement`|写出结束元素标记。Writes out the end element tag.| |`EndEntity`|无操作。No operation.| |`XmlDeclaration`|写出 XML 声明节点。Writes out the XML declaration node.| 如果读取器处于初始状态，则此方法会将读取器移动到文件末尾。If the reader is in the initial state, this method moves the reader to the end of file. 如果读取器已在文件结尾或处于关闭状态，则此方法将无法操作。If the reader is already at the end of file or in a closed state, this method is non-operational. 下面C#的代码将整个 XML 输入文档复制到控制台：The following C# code copies an entire XML input document to the console: ```csharp XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(myfile); XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(Console.Out); writer.WriteNode(reader, false); ``` 如果已移出根节点并将其放置在文档中的其他位置， C#以下示例将正确写出节点。If you have moved off the root node and are positioned elsewhere in the document the following C# example correctly writes out the nodes. ```csharp XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(myfile); reader.Read(); // Read PI reader.Read(); // Read Comment reader.Read(); // Read DOCType XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(Console.Out); while (!reader.EOF){ writer.WriteNode(reader, false); } ``` 如果读取器已配置为返回空白，并且编写器已配置为缩进输出，则 `WriteNode` 可能会产生奇怪的输出。If the reader is configured to return white space and the writer has is configured to indent output, `WriteNode` may produce strange output. 基本上会获得双重格式。You will essentially be getting double formatting. 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下面的示例将第一个和最后一个书本节点写入控制台。The following example writes the first and last book nodes out to the console. [!code-cpp[XmlWriter.WriteNode#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteNode/CPP/writenode.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlWriter.WriteNode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteNode/CS/writenode.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter.WriteNode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteNode/VB/writenode.vb#1)] 该示例使用文件（`books.xml`）作为输入。The example uses the file, `books.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[XmlWriter.WriteNode#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.WriteNode/XML/books.xml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了此方法支持的 `XPath` 节点类型。The following table shows the supported `XPath` node types for this method. |XPathNodeTypeXPathNodeType|WriteNode 行为WriteNode Behavior| |-------------------|------------------------| |`Root`|写出所有节点，而不考虑类型。Writes out all the nodes irrespective of type. 也就是说，编写器使用 ，并写出根节点中的所有节点（包括属性、处理指令、注释等）。That is, the writer consumes the and writes out all the nodes from the root node (including attributes, processing instructions, comments and so on.)| |`Element`|写出元素节点和任何属性节点。Writes out the element node and any attribute nodes.| |`Attribute`|无操作。No operation. 请改用 或 。Use or instead.| |`Text`|写出文本节点。Writes out the text node.| |`Namespace`|无操作。No operation. 使用 或 方法来编写命名空间声明。Use the or method to write the namespace declaration.| |`ProcessingInstruction`|写出处理指令节点。Writes out the processing instruction node.| |`Comment`|写出注释节点。Writes out the comment node.| |`SignificantWhitespace`|写出有效的空白节点。Writes out the significant white space node.| |`Whitespace`|写出空白节点。Writes out the white space node.| 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法从文档中复制第一个 book 节点并将其写入控制台。The following example uses the method to copy the first book node from a document and write it to the console. [!code-csharp[XmlWriteNode_nav#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriteNode_nav/CS/XmlWriteNode_nav.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriteNode_nav#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriteNode_nav/VB/XmlWriteNode_nav.vb#1)] 该示例使用 books.xml 文件作为输入。The example uses the books.xml file as input. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于编写 XML 声明（而不是 ）。This method can be used to write the XML declaration (rather than ). 这可能导致无法正确写入编码属性。This could result in the encoding attribute being incorrectly written. 例如，以下C#代码将导致无效的 XML 文档，因为默认编码为 utf-8。For example, the following C# code would result in an invalid XML document because the default encoding is UTF-8. ```csharp XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create("output.xml"); writer.WriteProcessingInstruction("xml", "version='1.0' encoding='UTF-16'"); writer.WriteStartElement("root"); writer.Close(); ``` 如果 `text` `null` 或 `String.Empty`，则此方法会写入没有数据内容的 `ProcessingInstruction`，例如 \<？ name？ >。If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a `ProcessingInstruction` with no data content, for example \. 如果文本包含无效的 "？ >" 序列，则 可以引发 （ 对象）或插入一个空格？If text contains an invalid sequence of "?>", the can either throw an ( objects) or insert a space "? > "以避免写入无效的 XML （ 方法创建的对象）。>" to avoid writing invalid XML ( objects created by the method). 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下面的示例编写一个表示书的 XML 文件。The following example writes an XML file representing a book. remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档的编码级别由编写器的实现方式决定。The encoding level of the document is determined by how the writer is implemented. 例如，如果在 `XmlTextWriter` 构造函数中指定了 对象，这将确定 encoding 特性的值。For example, if an object is specified in the `XmlTextWriter` constructor, this determines the value of the encoding attribute. 此方法不创建独立属性。This method does not create a standalone attribute. 调用 `WriteStartDocument` 时，编写器将验证你编写的内容是否是格式正确的 XML 文档。When `WriteStartDocument` is called the writer validates that what you are writing is a well-formed XML document. 例如，它将检查 XML 声明是否为第一个节点、是否存在一个且仅有一个根级别的元素，等等。For example, it checks that the XML declaration is the first node, that one and only one root-level element exists, and so on. 如果未调用此方法，编写器将假设正在编写 XML 片段，并且不应用根级别规则。If this method is not called, the writer assumes an XML fragment is being written and applies no root level rules. 如果已调用 `WriteStartDocument`，而 方法用于创建另一个 XML 声明，则会引发异常。If `WriteStartDocument` has been called and then the method is used to create another XML declaration, an exception will be thrown. 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteString` 执行以下操作：`WriteString` does the following: - `&`、`<`和 `>` 字符分别替换为 `&`、`<`和 `>`。The characters `&`, `<`, and `>` are replaced with `&`, `<`, and `>`, respectively. - 使用 创建的 的默认行为是在0x1F （排除空格字符0x9、0xA 和0xD）的范围内尝试写入字符值时引发 。The default behavior of an created using is to throw an when attempting to write character values in the range 0x-0x1F (excluding white space characters 0x9, 0xA, and 0xD). 通过创建 ，并将 属性设置为 `false`，可以编写这些无效的 XML 字符。These invalid XML characters can be written by creating the with the property set to `false`. 这样做将导致字符被数字字符实体（&\#0; 到 & #0x1F）替换。Doing so will result in the characters being replaced with numeric character entities (&\#0; through �x1F). 此外，默认情况下，使用 `new` 运算符创建的 会将无效字符替换为数字字符实体。Additionally, an created with the `new` operator will replace the invalid characters with numeric character entities by default. **注意**Microsoft 不鼓励编写无效 XML 字符的做法，因为许多使用 XML 的应用程序都不能处理无效字符。**Note** Microsoft does not encourage the practice of writing invalid XML characters since many applications that consume XML are not designed to handle invalid characters. - 如果在属性值的上下文中调用 `WriteString`，则会分别使用 `"` 和 `'` 替换双引号和单引号。If `WriteString` is called in the context of an attribute value, double and single quotes are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively. 例如，此输入字符串 `testtest` 写出为For example, this input string `testtest` is written out as ``` test<item>test ``` 如果 `text` `null` 或 `String.Empty`，则此方法会写入没有数据内容的文本节点。If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a text node with no data content. 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下面的示例写入 XML 节点。The following example writes an XML node. [!code-cpp[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/CPP/XmlWriter.Close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/CS/writeelems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter.Close/VB/writeelems.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅适用于使用 UTF-16 编码的系统。This method is only applicable on systems that use UTF-16 encoding. 代理项字符实体是以十六进制格式编写的。The surrogate character entity is written in hexadecimal format. 代理项字符的范围 #x10000 为 #x10FFFF。The range for surrogate characters is #x10000 to #x10FFFF. 以下公式用于生成代理项字符实体：（`highChar` 0xD800） \* 0x400 + （`lowChar`-0xDC00） + 0x10000The following formula is used to generate the surrogate character entity: (`highChar` -0xD800) \* 0x400 + (`lowChar` -0xDC00) + 0x10000 对于 HTML 和 XML，文档字符集（以及数字字符引用的表示法）基于 UCS [ISO-10646]。For both HTML and XML, the document character set (and therefore the notation of numeric character references) is based on UCS [ISO-10646]. 因此，在某些情况下，源文档中的单个数字字符引用可与字符串中的 2 16 位单元（高代理项和低代理项）相对应。A single numeric character reference in a source document may therefore in some cases correspond to two 16-bit units in a string (a high surrogate and a low surrogate). 这些16位单元称为代理项对。These 16-bit units are referred to as a surrogate pair. 有关代理项或字符的详细信息，请参阅位于 或[W3C XML 1.0 建议的第2.2 节](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets)中的 Unicode 3.0/unicode 2.0 标准的3.7 节。For more information regarding surrogates or characters, refer to section 3.7 of the Unicode 3.0/Unicode 2.0 standard located at , or [section 2.2 of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets). 有关此方法的异步版本，请参阅 。For the asynchronous version of this method, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法接受公共语言运行时（CLR）简单类型的值，根据 XML 架构定义语言（XSD）数据类型转换规则将其转换为其字符串表示形式，并使用 方法将这些值写入它们。The method accepts common language runtime (CLR) simple-typed values, converts them to their string representations according to the XML schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules, and writes them out by using the method. 这使你能够在 、和 对象之间传递数据时，以最小的重新分析开销来管道简单类型的值。This enables you to pipeline simple-type values with minimal reparsing overhead when passing data between , , and objects. 当处理 CLR 简单类型和 实例时，此功能也很有用。This ability is also useful when dealing with CLR simple-types and an instance. 您可以调用 方法来编写类型化的值，而不是使用 类中的方法将类型化数据转换为字符串值，然后将其写入。You can call the method to write the typed value instead of using the methods in the class to convert the typed data to a string value before writing it out. 对于异步操作，请将 的返回值转换为字符串，然后使用 方法。For asynchronous operations, convert the return value of to a string and use the method. 下表显示了对应于 CLR 类型的默认 XSD 数据类型。The following table shows the default XSD data types that correspond to CLR types. 如果 CLR 对象是列表类型，例如 、 或 ，将作为值类型数组对待。If the CLR object is a list type, such as , , or , it is treated as an array of the value type. |CLR 类型CLR type|默认 XSD 数据类型Default XSD data type| |--------------|---------------------------| ||xsd:booleanxsd:boolean| |**|xsd:integerxsd:integer| | 数组 array|xsd:base64Binaryxsd:base64Binary| |**|xsd:stringxsd:string| ||xsd:dateTimexsd:dateTime| ||xsd:decimalxsd:decimal| ||xsd:doublexsd:double| |**|xsd:integerxsd:integer| ||xsd:integerxsd:integer| ||xsd:integerxsd:integer| ||xsd:floatxsd:float| ||xsd:stringxsd:string| ||xsd:stringxsd:string| ||xsd:base64Binaryxsd:base64Binary| \*\*这些类型不符合 CLS。\*\*These types are not CLS-compliant. 它们没有相应的 方法。They do not have corresponding methods. 如果继续多次调用 ，值不会通过空格分隔。If is called multiple times in succession, the values are not delimited by a space. 必须在调用 之间调用 ，以插入空白。You must call between calls to to insert white space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法获取公共语言运行时对象，并使用 XML 架构定义语言（XSD）数据类型转换规则将输入值转换为所需的输出类型。This method takes the common language runtime object and converts the input value to the desired output type using the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules. 在调用 方法时， 根据 XML 架构 (XSD) 数据类型定义将值转换为其字符串表示形式并使用 方法写出。When the method is called, the converts the value to its string representations according to the XML Schema (XSD) data type rules and writes it out using the method. 如果继续多次调用 ，值不会通过空格分隔。If is called multiple times in succession, the values are not delimited by a space. 必须在调用 之间调用 ，以插入空白。You must call between calls to to insert white space. 将数组类型传递给 重载，以写出非重复值的数组。Pass an array type to the overload to write out an array of distinct values. 如果在输出纯文本的 实例上调用此方法，则将类型化值序列化为文本。If this method is called on an instance that outputs text-only, the typed value is serialized to text. 对于异步操作，请将此方法的返回值转换为字符串，并使用 方法。For asynchronous operations, convert the return value of this method to a string and use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法获取公共语言运行时对象，并使用 XML 架构定义语言（XSD）数据类型转换规则将输入值转换为所需的输出类型。This method takes the common language runtime object and converts the input value to the desired output type using the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules. 在调用 方法时， 根据 XML 架构 (XSD) 数据类型定义将值转换为其字符串表示形式并使用 方法写出。When the method is called, the converts the value to its string representations according to the XML Schema (XSD) data type rules and writes it out using the method. 如果继续多次调用 ，值不会通过空格分隔。If is called multiple times in succession, the values are not delimited by a space. 必须在调用 之间调用 ，以插入空白。You must call between calls to to insert white space. 将数组类型传递给 重载，以写出非重复值的数组。Pass an array type to the overload to write out an array of distinct values. 如果在输出纯文本的 实例上调用此方法，则将类型化值序列化为文本。If this method is called on an instance that outputs text-only, the typed value is serialized to text. 对于异步操作，请将此方法的返回值转换为字符串，并使用 方法。For asynchronous operations, convert the return value of this method to a string and use the method.
